settings.title: MEET THE TEAM BEHIND THE OOSC DREAM

settings.text: The OOSC team are a bunch of friends who are passionate about skiing and have a joint love for Apres. Check out some of the team members below!

settings.title: AARON McLAUGHLIN
settings.text:
Co-Founder

Aaron has been part of the OOSC team from the beginning in 2014 and loves a combination of skiing and partying! Having done a season in Chamonix before studying law at Uni Aaron has always loved skiing nowadays he loves a cheeky Jager at any opportunity and seems to enjoy the après almost as much as the slopes themselves….. #AprèsEveryday

settings.title: NICK MARSDEN
settings.text:
Co-Founder

Nick’s mutual love of skiing and partying define the reasons why he became part of OOSC. After a season in Les Deux Alpes before studying Law at university, Nick always had aspirations of working in the ski industry in some way or another and became a co-founding member of OOSC in 2014. A ski-suit convert and technical turn fanatic, you’ll not find him too far away from any Après session, whether it be in the Alps or in London!

settings.title: LUCY AITKEN
settings.text:
Design Executive

After escaping the UK in the peak of the pandemic, Lucy was seen repping OOSC in Verbier for ski season 20/21. Although, her journey with OOSC actually all started because of a birthday cake… now she's living her dream designing the funkiest ski, gym and swimwear! Can also be seen causing trouble on the slopes alongside the OOSC team with an aperol in hand.

settings.title: ZOE HESSION
settings.text:
Customer Service Assistant

Despite learning to ski at a young age and having done 5 ski seasons in France and Italy, Zoe's ski style is more 'Sunday morning jog' than extreme sport. But nevertheless you'll be able to spot her at first lift on a bluebird day and dancing around to the good vibes at Aprés!

settings.title: DANIEL BENTHAM
settings.text:
Marketing Manager

Daniel joins the team as the marketing mastermind. Usually, the first one up to hit the slopes and the last one back from the bar. Daniels snowboarding style is a bit more laid back than most, he favours deep powder and chilled routes, most likely to save his energy and legs for dancing around at Après Ski. Being 6ft 5, you won’t be able to miss our very own giant in his Fresh Prince Ski Suit.

settings.title: LEWIS TARNAI-WILSON
settings.text:
Brand Ambassador

Back from California again after the summer! In the winter you’ll find me at La Folie Douce whenever possible table hopping and throwing down the best shapes to been seen in ski boots. If I’m not at La Folie Douce I’ll be either lapping the park or looking for those fresh lines off-piste after the snow has fallen making claim to putting the first tracks on those mountains!

settings.title: WANT TO JOIN THE OOSC TEAM?

settings.text: If you're planning on doing a season and love to party as much as we do, get involved here, wear our gear and generally spread the old school love as part of the OOSC team.
